metadata.title: CVE-2021-32478 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The redirect URI in the LTI authorization endpoint required extrasanitizing to prevent reflected XSS and open redirect risks. Moodleversions 3.10 to 3.10.3, 3.9 to 3.9.6, 3.8 to 3.8.8 and earlier unsupportedversions are affected.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
